title: Storm Hits The Ranch and Left Us With a Surprise!

tasks.task: Drive to ranch after attending a wedding.
subtasks: Check for a turkey hen outside the pen.
Inspect water gaps and bison movements.
Cut down cedars or check their origins.
Search for arrowheads during outdoor activities.
Greet and interact with animals (e.g., turkeys, cats, dogs).
Address a runaway turkey hen and attempt to corral it.

tasks.task: Work with animals during storms aftermath.
subtasks: Check fence panels and move pigs or chickens if necessary.
Determine whether to collect eggs or allow mother hen to incubate naturally.
Allow breeding bulls to graze cover crops.
Clear a lane for entering the ranch.

tasks.task: Partner with sponsor (AG1) for video promotion.
